entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-sdk-6.0 version 6.0.301 on Ubuntu LTS 22.04 breaks the Q# Language Extension in Visual Studio Code #26065
  • `dotnet sln add` can create parent solution folders when adding existing projects #26064
  • Build failed with exception #26060
  • Failure to publish WASM when project source path contains blank spaces - Post-upgrade VS 2022 to 17.2.4 #26061
  • With .NET7 preview 6 SDK installed on Turkish OS, error happen when dotnet publish with AOT enable. #26053
  • runtime is missing in global location #26052
  • WebAssembly workload should check if `python` is available, when installing on Linux #26050

Closed

  • `dotnet test` fails to launch `DumpMinitool*.exe` because it is a DLL - doesn't produce dump for process of different architecture #25421

PullRequests

Created

  • Consume razor sg #26049
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #26048
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix copy&paste mistake in PublicSign preservation #25947
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Define SystemCollectionsImmutableVersion Versions.props #26007
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Force rebuilding R2R images if project files have been changed #26046
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #26013
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #26012
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Support workload pack groups for repair, download, and show URL operations #25829
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure
